generic_name: BACITRACIN ZINC, NEOMYCIN SULFATE, POLYMYXIN B SULFATE
dosage_administration: Directions Clean the affected area Apply a small amount of this product (an amount equal to the surface area of the tip of a finger) on the area 1 to 3 times daily May be covered with a sterile bandage.
indications: Uses First aid to help prevent infection in minor cuts, scrapes and burns
